:The manufacturer's site is available: [http://www.sky-light.com.hk Sky Light]
*[http://www.engadget.com/2012/09/20/ion-the-game-action-cam-has-built-in-wifi-and-2-5-inch-display/ This device was apparently previously known as '''The Game'''. (engadget link)] <!-- the first camera marketed solely to 4chan users --> :will retail for 329 Euros?
This device appears to use the A5s SoC from ''[[Ambarella]]'' A5 @528MHz (ARM1136J-S) :(the Ambarella logo is clearly visible in the FCC photos, but the part number is not)
The wireless module (using an [[Atheros]] WiSoC) is silkscreened with "EP-SVA70MB-01" :(or possibly "EP-SVA7UMB-01"). The antenna is silkscreened with "EP-ANT-02".
While the 'manual' seems to indicate the device uses microSD, :the device actually seems to use a full size SD card.
===Specifications=== :;Specs from the FCC 'manual'.. *5 Megapixel camera, shoots 1080p video *2.2nanometer 1/2.5" HD CMOS sensor *150degree ultra wide angle in 720p *170degree ultra wide angle in 960p *127degree wide angle in 1080p *JPEG format photos *AAC audio compression, mono w/ AGC *Up to 32GB microSD cards supported *Average recording time of 4 hours (using 32GB microSD card) *USB 2.0 Host (for charging and data transfer), HDMI, AV/Composite *Burst (10 photos), Time lapse (5/10/30/60s), and Self-timer (5/10s) modes *1200mAh Li-ion battery, approx. 2.5 hours w/o Wi-Fi or 1 hours w/ Wi-Fi :(w/ around 15 meter operation distance) *Waterproof at a depth up to 3 meters *Dimension: 85mm x 66mm x 38.1mm *Weight: ~175g
